column1: 141kph, back of a length on leg, he tries to heave over midwicket and gets hit on the back thigh
135kph, full and shaping into leg, he clips this neatly to forward square
good length, top of off, he defends from the crease but they pinch one to mid on

top edge goes straight up! Brathwaite takes the catch. He tried to pull a back of a length ball from off stump, he got a top edge that flew straight up and Brathwaite takes the catch coming in from midwicket
good length, shaping away, he is defending from the crease, gets an edge that rolls to slip
good length, angled into off, he defends with soft hands to midwicket and takes a single
top edges a sweep behind square! Full on middle, he tried to sweep along the ground but the top edge flies safely behind square
good length, defended back to the bowler

reverse sweep comes off the glove and pops up to Philippe! He tried to reverse sweep from a conventional stance, it hurried him and hit the glove, it popped up high towards where slip would be and Philippe moved well to get back and take it
flighted on leg, he works this to midwicket for a single
drifting into middle, he's back and defending into the off side
late cut past short third man! Shorter length on off, he gives room and late cuts, he didn't middle it but hit it well enough to find the gap and it ran away
good length, 144kph, fourth stump angled across, he leaves
shorter into the hip, he's taken on thigh pad, it rolls into the off side and they pinch a single
good length, shaping away, he shuffled back and across and gets a thick edge and runs to third man
beaten by the angle. No shape, good length, angled across the right hander and he tried to drive on the up
full and swinging down the leg side
full and shaping into middle, he clips this firmly to mid on
back of a length, on off, he's back and pushing to mid off
good length, fifth stump, some bounce and shape away, he leaves
good length, nipping in, 137kph, he shuffles down and gets taken on the thigh pad, it runs to fine leg
good length, 131kph, angled into the top of off, he sits back and works it to mid on
108kph, slower ball on leg, he clips this off his pads through square leg
134kph, back of a length on off, he sits back and defends towards backward point for a single
138kph, back of a length outside off, he forces square off the back foot to point

tried to sweep from outside off, but his front foot slip and he played over it. Philippe didn't take it. Carey had to stretch to get his foot back. Had he taken it cleanly there might have been an issue
beaten by a wrong un trying to cut outside off
fuller outside off, he drives through cover
leg break drifting in and it hits the front pad, they appeal but it was sliding down leg, no real turn
shorter wrong un, he's back and pushing through point
pulled through square leg! Too short and he went back and pulled firmly into the gap in the deep
shorter off break, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point
drifting into the pad, it runs into the leg side and they pinch one
tossed up slower outside off, he sweeps behind square and wants two but it's not on
he charged and stopped as Manenti dragged his length back, he cut it through point
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point
leg break outside off, he pushes into the cover gap for one
play and miss driving at a wrong un outside off
shorter wrong un, he cracks it off the back foot straight to cover
shorter leg break, he cuts to backward point and Dwarshuis is a little slow to gather and fire, Wells just beats the throw
some width, fractionally short, he picks out backward point with a cut
an appeal for lbw but he got an inside edge. He was trying to sweep from off stump and got a thick inside edge onto pad. Good decision.
short and wide, he cuts firmly to backward point and Dwarshuis makes a great diving save to his right
back of a length angled into the hip, he tucks this to square leg
back of a length outside off, he mistimes a pull shot to midwicket
short ball down leg, he misses the pull shit but it's called wide
good length, top of middle, he's back and working it behind square
back of a length on middle, he's hit on the thigh pad trying to pull
back of a length, fourth stump, he tries to pull and plays over it. it wasn't far from off stump
top spinner on off, he's back and cutting to backward square
slog sweep from outside off carries a long way towards long on but not quite to Christian. He does well to block it
shorter wrong un, he tries to cut but mistimes it
flicked over midwicket into the gap! Leg break into the hitting arc and he goes with the spin, nailing it into the gap. it nearly went for six
shorter outside off, he's back and forcing through point
pushed through quicker outside off, he cuts straight to backward point
fuller on middle, he drives to long on
good length outside off, he defends to the gap at cover-point
scooped over fine leg! Superb from Carey. Full angled into off, he stepped inside the line and flipped it with power high into the seats at fine leg. Great skill
back of a length on middle, he stays leg side and pushes it behind point
short ball, he pulls with control wide of fine leg and calls two immediately
yorker speared into leg, he jams it off the inside edge onto pad and they pinch one
slower ball outside off, he's back and cutting it behind point
slower ball on off, he gets a leading edge into cover and they pinch one
back of a length outside off, he late cuts to backward point
fuller slower ball, he cover drives into the gap
slower ball off cutter, on leg, he tucks it neatly behind square and they run well for two
slower ball on the up, he's back and working this behind square
he advances and yorks himself outside off, driving straight to cover
yorker, speared into leg, he squeezes this out to midwicket
low full toss on middle, he backs away and slaps it straight to cover
wide yorker surprised Carey as he backed away, he reaches out and taps it to cover
he advances to a short slower ball, he tries to pull and gets a bottom edge to midwicket
yorked speared into leg, he clips it straight to backward square
low full toss, he tried to launch over midwicket but miscues, dragging it square and they get two

caught at mid on! Carey picks out Brathwaite on the circle. Slower ball on leg, Carey was cramped a touch, he nailed it but couldn't get the elevation and he hit it flat to Brathwaite on the circle. He took the catch well
beaten. Squared up to a good length ball that angled in from around the wicket and seamed away
fuller, angled into leg, his front foot slides and puts him off balance, he gets hit on the pad and it rolls fine
beaten again by a slower ball off cutter outside off. He was just feeling for it
back of a length on off, he's back and working this through square leg
shorter on leg, he's back and tucking this around the corner
shorter length, it holds a touch in the surface and he checks a pull shot to deep square
quicker, sliding into off, he's back and working this square of deep midwicket and they run superbly
shorter length outside off, he's back and forcing this behind point and they get a couple
shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep midwicket
full and fired under the bat as he tries to sweep from outside off
back of a length outside off, he pulls through square leg to the man in the deep
pulled powerfully over midwicket! 137kph, short ball but it didn't get high enough, Wells rocked back and clubbed it over midwicket
late cut wide of third man and Pope can't make the save! A length ball angled across, he sits back and glides it with excellent timing. Pope got there with a dive but he couldn't smother it
good length top of off, he's squared up a touch, but he knocks it into cover
good length, fired down leg, and called wide
back of a length outside off, he is back and gliding this to third man
back of a length on the hip, he's back and working this behind square
tossed up and drifting across him from around the wicket, he advances and tries to whip, the leading edge flies in the air but safely to deep point
shorter length, on leg, he's back and forcing back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep point
cut hard past backward point! Not that short but he got some width, he sat right back deep in the crease, played it well and timed it superbly
similar length and line, he dabs this to short third man
good length on off, he stands tall and punches this to deep cover-point
good length, angled into middle, he's back and working this to short fine leg
he charges, it's a length ball angled into the pads, it comes off pad and runs into the off side
slower ball outside off, he just glides with an open face to short third man
bouncer way down the leg side
slower ball on leg, he uses his wrists to turn it behind square
fuller and lofted inside out to long off but it bounces short of the man on the rope
charges, Christian adjusts his length, delivers a good length slower ball, Wells defends to cover
slower ball really grips and stops in the surface, he tried to pull but missed it
another slower ball, stops in the surface, he tries to pull but misses, they pinch a bye
flicked just over short fine! Full and angled down leg at 134kph, he threw the bat at it, flicking it with the angle flat and just over the man on the circle
slower ball outside off, he crunches a drive straight to cover
he muscles a short slower ball wide of long on! A half century for Wells. That was a good shot given it really stopped in the surface. He timed it well to find the gap
cut superbly behind point! Short and too wide, he used this hands to create some pace and place it past backward point
slower ball full toss, he mistimes a drive towards long off
dropped by Silk at deep midwicket! He rarely drops them. A pull shot mishit towards deep midwicket, Silk runs to his left at full stretch, got two hands on it but it came out before he hit the ground
low full toss, he drives this through cover
low full toss on leg, he clips this through square leg
length ball on leg, it stays low, he pulls this fine to fine leg
slower ball outside leg, he tries to heave this away behind square but is taken on the pad
slower ball fired down the leg side
launched high over deep square! He got one angled into leg and into the hitting arc, Weatherald got under it and hit a towering ball over deep square into the stands
And again over fine leg! A bad ball down leg and he was waiting to flick this with power high over fine leg! A gift
shorter slower ball into the hip, he gloves a pull fine along the ground and Philippe makes the save diving to his right
clubbed flat through cover! Short slower ball outside off, it sat up and Wells stood tall and slapped forward of deep point
carved over point! Full and wide, he opened the face and placed it up and over backward point
holes out to long off! Full on off, he lofts this down the ground but didn't get enough of it and Christian runs to his right and takes the catch well
angled down leg, it comes off pad and Carey can't glove it cleanly
back of a length outside off, he stands tall and forces this off the back foot to mid off
whipped powerfully through midwicket! Full and straight he stepped across and drilled it with supreme timing
fuller length, outside off, he drives firmly back to the bowler

Wells makes a meal of it at deep point! It was sliced in the air behind point, Wells comes from deep cover-point and gets there easily, it wasn't going particularly quickly, he fumbled horribly and it went for four
beaten by a superb late away swinger. He was driving hard on the up
good length, turning away, he's back and punching back to the bowler
tossed up, he skips down and lofts this beautifully with the bottom hand down the ground!
full again, he drives against the turn to mid on
shorter on the hip, he's back and working this behind square
lofted powerfully over wide long on! It drifted into the arc and he plays a lovely check drive lofting into the stands. Held his shape superbly
another misfield! It was swept hard to backward square but Rashid Khan doesn't get his body behind it and it goes straight through him for four
good length top of off, he pushes to mid off for one
cracked straight back over Worrall's head! What a shot on the up! Not a half volley, he leaned forward and thumped it straight through the line flat down the ground with a vertical bat
shorter length, he pulls hard behind square to the sweeper
back of a length on off, he stands up and mistimes to mid on
crunched on the up wide of mid off! Good length wide of off, he stands tall and cracks it through the line into the gap
clubbed over mid off! Outstanding shot. Back of a length outside off, he stood up and thumped it off the back foot up and over mid off. Incredible power
he drives to mid on and they take one, but there's another misfield, it rolls straight through legs but fortunately for the Strikers Edwards wasn't watching and it only cost one extra run
mistimes a pull shout through midwicket and it nearly reaches the rope
miscued in the air but it flies between midwicket and mid on and it's a decent chase for mid on
fuller outside off, he drives on the up trying to thump it, but he gets it through cover without great timing
bouncer down leg, he pulls fine off the top edge and Worrall comes around to cut it off
fuller on middle, he drills a drive straight to mid off
full leg break, he drives to cover

chopped on! Rashid Khan delivers a badly needed breakthrough. A length leg break outside off, it stays a touch low, he tries to drive off the back foot through cover, gets a thick inside edge and it cannons into middle and off
fast leg break, 94kph, beats him outside off as he anchored to the crease
full and drifting into middle, he pushes this to long on
shorter length, he's back and working this to long on
wrong un, good length outside off, he leans forward and defends
back of a length, on off, he's back and working this to midwicket
shorter length, outside off, he's back and across and pulling through wide mid on
back of a length slower ball, he tries to drive on the up but mistimes it
full, angled into middle, he works to midwicket
132kph, short ball, he tries to pull, mistimes it, getting it high off the sticker but it lands safely
back of a length wide of off, he's back and gliding this to third man
swept wide of short fine! A fast leg break outside off, he got down on one knee and roped it powerfully behind square!

Bowled him! Brilliant wrong un! A good length wrong un, he gave room to drive through the off side, it spins through the gate, maybe brushed the inside edge, and it just clipped the outside of off stump and the leg bail fell
shorter wrong un, he's back and pushing to midwicket
he drives off a thick edge past slip and it runs fine for a couple
fuller leg break, he's working this to midwicket
play and miss trying to drive wide of off. He didn't pick the leg break and was beaten by the spin
good length, angled across, he sits back and guides this down to third man
full outside off, 126kph, he drives to mid off

chest high short ball, he pulls straight to the man at deep square and they take in the fielder and pinch two! That wasn't great from the fielder to take so long getting the throw off and allowing that
short angled down leg, he pulls this fine of deep fine for a couple
full, 141kph angled down leg and he glances fine with ease
back of a length wide of off, he stands tall and forces through point
shorter on leg, he's back and working it to deep midwicket
shorter length on off, he's back and forcing to deep point
looped up on leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
tossed up, he advances and works this through square leg
darted shorter into the hip, it comes off the thigh guard and runs fine
good length on off, he pushes off the back foot straight to cover
good length, on off, he defends to point
good length, top of off, he sits back and defends with soft hands
back of a length, he pushes to cover-point and takes on the fielder but he gets through
slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
shorter length on off, he sits back and pulls it with ease to the gap behind square
short slower ball outside off, he tries to pull but is done by the lack of pace
cut off a bottom edge past slip! He went back to a wrong un, didn't pick it til late, tried to cut and got a bottom edge that run away past slip

given LBW! A full leg break, it pitched on middle, Hughes stuck his pad straight down the track expecting a wrong un, it spins down the line and he's hit flush on the shin in front of middle. Looked plumb
shorter length, he's back and working this to midwicket
quicker on off, he's back and defending
quicker top spinner, he's back and working this to midwicket
full leg break outside off, he works this through midwicket who has been moved deep
leading edge flies safely through point! Good length on off, he closed the face and the leading edge flies to deep point
pulled high over deep square 10 rows back! A bouncer at head height, he swivelled on a pull and flushed it high and way back
Worrall misses it at long off! Short slower ball, he stands up and drives hard straight of long off, Worrall gets there easily with the slide but fumbles it over the rope!
short and wide, he cuts hard through backward point, Renshaw makes the diving stop this time
sliced off a thick outside edge between backward point and short third man! Full and wide, third man up, he drives hard and slices it into the gap
slower ball on middle, he drives down to long on
shorter length, he's back and cutting to deep point
darted into leg, he's back and pushing this towards long on
fired into leg stump, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
shorter outside off, he's back and slapping this past Briggs who got a touch but couldn't stop it
full and wide, he square drives to cover-point
lofted beautifully inside out over cover! Lovely shot. Pure class. Tossed up outside off, he gives room and lofts it with ease over the man. Lovely timing
90kph, leg break, he drives in the air towards long on
shorter wrong un, he's back and pulling to deep midwicket
quicker leg break, he tries to cut but misses
beaten by a superb leg break. Pitching on a fourth stump line and he had no idea which way it was turning
straighter leg break on middle, he works it to square leg
fuller length, he drives to cover
cut off a thick edge straight between backward point and short third! It was short and wide, he was fortunate the thick edge found the gap but it wasn't a great delivery
back of a length into the hip, he tucks it into the leg side
full on off, he drives to mid off and the man on the circle cuts it off
back of a length outside leg, he backs away to pull but gets it off the toe of the bat to midwicket
slower ball on leg, he clips this firmly to deep midwicket
he charges at a short slower ball down leg, he gets it off the glove and it runs on the bounce to the keeper
full on middle, he drives to mid on
driven to the man at mid on, he takes on the throw of Rashid Khan and he missed! He was gone by a mile if he hit
full outside off, he drives firmly to cover
slower ball outside off, he mistimes a drive to cover
thick inside edge past leg! Full and angling in, he drives hard, gets a thick inside edge and it flies away to the rope
thumps a drive down the ground! Too full, he drives powerfully through the line straight past Siddle and it runs away
tossed up, drifting into middle, he pushes to mid on
hit like a rocket down the ground! Full on middle, he gives room and smashes it along the ground past Briggs straight to the sightscreen
pulled through midwicket! The over correction is short, he's back quickly and smashing it past midwicket
good length on off, he mistimes back to bowler
full toss, hammered back at Briggs and he blocks it
tossed up, he drives to long on
short drag down, cut hard to deep point for a couple
short on middle, he pulls off balance to deep forward square
tossed up on middle, he drives firmly wide of long off for two
good length outside off, he's back and forcing this to long off
tossed up on middle, he drives straight to cover
cut powerfully through cover-point and beats the sweeper! That will do it. Just a rank long hop and he found the rope
